About

M ichael Adrian Lucas is a User interface designer and developer.

His focus is on building human-centric intuitive and pleasant interactions and experiences.

He has lived and worked in Budapest, Hamburg, Saigon, Shanghai, and Seoul. Prior to designing and developing great user experiences and digital products, he was a business communication instructor, journalist, and copywriter.
